rule_text: The active system is the system that is activated during a tactical action.   5.1 When a player performs a tactical action, he activates a system by placing a command token from his tactic pool on that system. That system is the active system.   5.2 A player cannot activate a system that already contains one of his command tokens.   5.3 A player can activate a system that contains command tokens that match other players' factions.   5.4 A system remains the active system for the duration of the tactical action during which it was activated.
